question say device can be replace by using subinterface in router config, layer3 switch use SVI to replace it so C is correct answer
question say device can be replace by using subinterface in router config, layer3 switch use SVI to replace it so C is correct answer

For this Question, I am thinking good answer is "D" because, we create Subinterfaces on Router not on layer 3 switch for Vlan routing. Example R1(config)#interface g0/0.20 for subinterface vlan 20. This command is not possible on switch layer 3.

comments.content: Routing is done with L3 so you don't need a traditional layer 3 (router).

questions.question_text: Which type of device can be replaced by the use of subinterfaces for VLAN routing?
which command is used to know the duplex speed of serial link?
Which switching method duplicates the first six bytes of a frame before making a switching decision?

discussion.content: Cut and Through method has lowest latency. In this method Switch only read first six bytes from frame after the preamble. These six bytes are the destination address of frame. This is the fastest method of switching. This method also processes invalid frames. Only advantage of this method is speed.

Selected Answer: C
The answer is C

Selected Answer: C
These six bytes are the destination address of frame. This is the fastest method of switching.

Selected Answer: C
ppp is correct
I think PPP is the correct.

questions.question_text: Which Layer 2 protocol encapsulation type supports synchronous and asynchronous circuits and has built-in security mechanisms?

discussion.content: It should be B C and F

BCF is correct.

Four technical services are essential to supporting the high level of flexibility, resource availability, and transparent resource connectivity required for cloud computing:
+ The Layer 3 network offers the traditional routed interconnection between remote sites and provides end-user access to cloud services.
+ The extended LAN between two or more sites offers transparent transport and supports application and operating system mobility.
+ Extended SAN services support data access and accurate data replication.
+ IP Localization improves northbound and southbound traffic as well as server-to-server workflows.

Reference: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/ios-nx-os-software/ios-xr-software/white_paper_c11-694882.html
B C E are the answers
